com.example.stanza

Class EditPoemActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Activity
      • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        • android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
          • com.example.stanza.EditPoemActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompatApi23.RequestPermissionsRequestCodeValidator, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.support.v7.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatCallback, CommInterface

    public class EditPoemActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
implements CommInterface
    A class for editing personal poems, with added rhyming functionality from the Wordnik api.

      • EditPoemActivity

        public EditPoemActivity()

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Called on the creation of an EditPoemActivity. Initializes EditText fields for the poem's title and text and fills them with the values stored in the local database, then initializes the HorizontalScrollView and LinearLayout which will contain rhyme suggestions.
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - allows us to call Android's onCreate function in addition to ours.

      • onResume

        public void onResume()
        Called whenever the app resumes. Re-schedules the TimerTask which checks every second to see whether the selected word has changed, and if so, creates a new rhymeTask(), getting rhyme suggestions for the new word.
        Overrides:
        onResume in class android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity

      • onPause

        public void onPause()
        If the activity is paused, cancels rhymeTime.
        Overrides:
        onPause in class android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity

      • onStop

        public void onStop()
        If the activity is stopped, cancels rhymeTime.
        Overrides:
        onStop in class android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity

      • onDestroy

        public void onDestroy()
        If the activity is destroyed, cancels rhymeTime.
        Overrides:
        onDestroy in class android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity

      • onCreateOptionsMenu

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)
        Creates the options bar with the home, delete and publish_poem_to_server buttons. Only creates this bar for edited poems; does not create this bar for new poems.
        Parameters:
        menu - The options menu to be created.
        Returns:
        true, every time this is called.

      • onOptionsItemSelected

        public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem item)
        Depending on which menu item was selected, take the appropriate action. If home, go home. If delete, do delete confirmation and then delete the poem. If publish_poem_to_server, publish the poem to the server.
        Parameters:
        item - The options item that was selected.
        Returns:
        true, every time this is called.

      • onBackPressed

        public void onBackPressed()
        Called when the device's back button is pressed. Saves any changes to the poem's text or title, or deletes it if both are empty.
        Overrides:
        onBackPressed in class android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity

      • pushPoem

        public void pushPoem(java.lang.String poemTitle,
                     java.lang.String poemText)
        Pushes a poem to the backend database, to be shared with friends. Starts and interrupts a CommThread to do this.
        Parameters:
        poemTitle - The value to be inserted into the local database under POEM_TEXT.
        poemText - The value to be inserted into the local database under POEM_TITLE.

      • poemSaved

        public void poemSaved(java.lang.String output)
        Displays the proper message if a poem is saved to the database.
        Specified by:
        poemSaved in interface CommInterface
        Parameters:
        output - Gives this output if poem is saved.

      • serverDisconnected

        public void serverDisconnected()
        Displays the shown message if the server is disconnected.
        Specified by:
        serverDisconnected in interface CommInterface

      • onPullFinished

        public void onPullFinished()
        Called when Pull is Finished. Does nothing.
        Specified by:
        onPullFinished in interface CommInterface
